price: Ariko abazahindukira (bakica isezerano) nyuma y’ibyo, abo ni bo nkozi z’ibibi.
arabic: فَمَن تَوَلَّىٰ بَعۡدَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡفَٰسِقُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: faman tawallā baʿda dhālika fa-ulāika humu al-fāsiqūna
